name: Undertale: Boss Rush
description:
A Prototype of a Undertale Boss Rush that would go through a few bosses and give you the same type of options the original game had that is all recreated in Unity. I had plans for a Good end, Bad end, and a Neutral end. When I created this game its for Global Game Jam of 2019, which was the reason of the story. This only has one boss. 

All the assets for this comes from the original game, Undertale by Toby Fox.
